name: agentron-studio
description: Enterprise-ready local AI agent orchestration and workflow automation

scripts.release:prepare: npm run release:bump -- patch && npm test && npm run build:ui && npm run build:docs
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint:ui && npm run test:coverage --workspace packages/ui
scripts.pre-push: npm run check && npm run build:ui && npm run build:docs && npm run dist --workspace apps/desktop
scripts.build:desktop: npm run build:ui && npm run build --workspace apps/desktop
scripts.start:desktop: npm run build --workspace apps/desktop && npx electron apps/desktop
scripts.dist:desktop: npm run build:desktop && npm run dist --workspace apps/desktop
